segments.text: I notice the woman in her apron, so calmly drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is full, water spilling over the edge steadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a puddle that's spreading across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has one foot in it, but her face shows nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her side, stacks of clean bowls and plates wait.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above shows a neat garden path outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside the cabinet, the cookie jar is open wide.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretched high on his stool, grabbing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It wobbles a bit, but he's determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below looks up eagerly, palm open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sharing a secret moment, how sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that overflow could ruin the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't make too much noise and get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene feels so everyday, yet tense.
segments.speaker: PAR
